response.original_title: White Shoes & The Couples Company Di Cikini
response.overview: White Shoes & The Couples Company in Cikini is a documentary film that captures the special moments of the homecoming concert of the legendary Jakarta band, White Shoes & The Couples Company. Directed by the Henry Foundation, the film not only showcases music and nostalgia, but also serves as an emotional journey back to the band's rootsâ€”the Cikini neighborhood.  Through archives, intimate conversations, and concert footage, the film reveals the members' personal relationships with the spaces that shaped their identities as artists: from the streets and campuses to the creative spaces that witnessed their early days. "White Shoes & The Couples Company in Cikini" is a love letter to the city, the music, and the friendships that endure among Jakarta's old buildings.
response.title: White Shoes & The Couples Company Di Cikini
